message: LIES TRUMP IS THE HEALTHIEST! He told me so, so it must be true. And he only weighs 234lbs!

Unless is your Nth wedding... Get yourself a wedding photographer (not just any photographer, an actual wedding photographer!). It is after all, a once (or twice, or thrice for some?) in a lifetime event that you want to have amazing pictures of and while yes your family and friends will take photos and all, do you seriously want to leave it to chance? It is hard work, it takes skill, it takes education and practice. Save expenses somewhere else: invite a couple less people, get another venue, maybe even go for other flower arrangements, etc but definitely don't skimp on the photographer!

The issue is not WHO is running. The issue is are WE going to become and remain vigilant citizens who prioritize our politics and culture and rights, over television and instant gratification? It's up to us, why aren't you doing articles on voting and the lack there of, and the low numbers that turn out? Why aren't you doing stories on the need to be involved all the time, and to demand accountability from all elected officials?

""""Just ignorant stupid liberals won't hear* any of it."""" That's better. Your dismissal of Hillary still doesn't address the fact that Trump is continuing to surround himself with the elite and wealthy. The same persons who use loopholes to avoid contributing taxes to our government, who happily send jobs overseas to improve their bottom line but not the life of citizens in the U.S.. How is Trump going to help make our country better when the people he's working with are practiced at only making the lives of their fellow elite members better first? Trickle down economics doesnt work.
